name: CWTS citation cluster data
description: This dataset contains bibliometric and citation cluster data from the Centre for Science and Technology Studies (cwts.nl) database. Citations are clustered by co-citation in referencing articles

creator.name: Thed van Leeuwen
creator.CRediT_details: Advisory collaborator and contact person at CWTS. Participated in lab meetings related to study Conceptualization. Collected bibliometrics data, including citation cluster information related to goal A and B.

variableMeasured.name: label
variableMeasured.description: Custom label used for search in database. Constant across records.

variableMeasured.name: cluster_id1
variableMeasured.description: Cluster ID for the lowest level of clustering

variableMeasured.name: n_pubs
variableMeasured.description: Number of publications in the cluster

variableMeasured.name: mncs
variableMeasured.description: Mean Normalzized Citation Score, compared to the field(s) to which the paper belongs (here, the cluster)

variableMeasured.name: mnjs
variableMeasured.description: Mean Normalized Journal Score (the CWTS equivalent of the JIF, but solving the issue sof the JIF).

variableMeasured.name: pp_top_10%
variableMeasured.description: Belongs the paper to the top 10% of the most highly cited publications in the field(s) to which the paper belongs.
